All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Actor
The Actor class represents entities that have interactive capabilities and can perform actions (like players in the game).
Entity
The Entity class is the base class that represents a standard game entity within a game engine with a name, transform, id, type, active boolean flag, and a transform.
Main
The Main class is the driver class for the game engine.
Obstacle
The Obstacle class represents a static object in the game world (like towers or trees).
Transform
The Transform class represents the position, rotation, and speed of an Entity object
